tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive customer information including contact details, billing addresses, payment preferences, and account status for invoice generation.

customer_id.description: Unique identifier for the customer account

include_billing_history.description: Whether to include previous billing information

error_messages: Customer not found: The provided customer_id does not exist in the system. Verify the customer ID is correct.
Customer account inactive: The customer account is marked as inactive. Contact customer service to reactivate.
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to access customer data. Ensure proper authorization.
usage: Provide a valid customer_id to retrieve customer information. Set include_billing_history to true if historical billing data is needed for invoice customization.

customer_name.description: Full name or company name of the customer

billing_address.description: Complete billing address formatted for invoice display

contact_email.description: Primary email address for invoice delivery

tax_id.description: Customer tax identification number if applicable

account_status.description: Current status of the customer account
